newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech crown gets small boost from ind sales data.
newsitem.headline: Czech crown gets small boost from ind sales data.

text.p: 0743 GMT - The Czech crown received a small but short-lived boost from unexpectedly strong June industrial sales data on Tuesday morning, but dealers said they expect the crown to continue to weaken against the mark.
* "We may see another attempt to push it (the crown) above 18.800 to the mark," said Petr Korous of Ceskoslovenska Obchodni Banka.

* The statistical office said June industrial sales rose a real 11.2 percent year-on-year compared with a fall of 0.7 percent in May. After the release the crown was temporarily boosted but then fell back.
* Although the figures were better than expected market sentiment is still overshadowed by pessimism about the economy and the effect of heavy flooding on the trade deficit, dealers said.
